questions.questionTitle: What problem does the man have?
Where does the man want to go?
What should the man do at 72nd Street?

script:
� Excuse me. I'm afraid I'm a bit lost. I'm looking for the library.
� The library? Let's see. The best way to get there is to go back to this street in front of the store and turn left. Go two intersections, then take a right onto 72nd Street.
� A right at 72nd?
� Yes. The next stoplight will be Williams street. Turn left, and you'll see the library a half block down on the left-hand side.
